DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether manual removal placenta cesarean delivery result higher change resistance blood flow throughout body , also call systemic vascular resistance ( SVR )
DOC.brief_title: Manual Expressed Placental Removal Cesarean Delivery Its Effects Various Cardiac Indices
DOC.detailed_description: Patients present William Beaumont Hospital Royal Oak Labor Delivery schedule low transverse cesarean delivery ask participate prospective , randomize study evaluate change systemic vascular resistance ( SVR ) pre- post-delivery . After obtain informed consent , patient randomize one two group : group 1 manual removal placenta cesarean section group 2 express removal placenta cesarean section . Both group pre-operative continuous wave Doppler evaluation post-operative continuous wave Doppler evaluation 24 hour delivery . Continuous wave Doppler evaluation use pre- post-operatively evaluate change SVR .
DOC.criteria: pregnant schedule cesarean delivery able give inform consent take medication may affect hemodynamics unable give inform consent
